overview:
A CPA with Twenty years of professional accounting and finance experience, Mike Kasten has extensive experience with startups and technology companies. His background includes audit manager at a big 4 accounting firm, where he was responsible for issuing client financial statements, holding numerous Controller positions including an ebusiness unit of a fortune 40 Company, and Director of Finance responsible for internal and external financial reporting including SEC Reporting for a public company.

Mike served as the former CFO of GolfNow (purchased by Comcast for 40 million), the largest tee time booking engine’ on the web. He advises Social Leverage portfolio companies on how to build structure as they grow and will take a board seat or advisory role where applicable.
